Canonical platform name.description: Canonical name for the platform. Used for Griffon identifying if the device is iOS or Android

Device type.description: The style of interface to use on the current device.

Operating system.description: The value is in the format "<OperationSystemName> <OperatingSystemVersion>"

Screen size.description: Phones display resolution in pixels (width x height)

Battery level.description: The battery charge level for the device. This is integer value ranging from 1 to 100. If unable to fetch battery value -1 is returned

Battery state.description: The battery state for the device.

Location service enabled.description: A boolean value indicating whether location services are enabled on the device. Users can enable or disable location services by toggling the Location Services switch in Settings > Privacy.

Low power mode enabled.description: Indicates whether Low Power Mode is enabled on an iOS device.
